statements: INSERT INTO KPIs (id, kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type) VALUES (1, 'Revenue', 'Total revenue generated', 'SELECT SUM(revenue) FROM sales;', 'Bar Chart');

INSERT INTO KPIs (id, kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type) VALUES (2, 'Net Profit', 'Net profit after expenses', 'SELECT SUM(revenue - expenses) FROM finances;', 'Line Chart');

INSERT INTO KPIs (id, kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type) VALUES (3, 'Customer Satisfaction', 'Average customer satisfaction score', 'SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) FROM feedback;', 'Pie Chart');

INSERT INTO KPIs (kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type, id) VALUES ('Customer Count', 'Total number of customers', 'SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customers;', 'Donut Chart', 4);

INSERT INTO KPIs (kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type, id) VALUES ('Conversion Rate', 'Percentage of conversions', 'SELECT (COUNT(conversions) / COUNT(visitors)) * 100 FROM website_data;', 'Line Chart', 5);
INSERT INTO KPIs (id, kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type) VALUES (1, 'Revenue', 'Total revenue for the month', 'SELECT SUM(revenue) FROM sales', 'Chart');

INSERT INTO KPIs (id, kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type) VALUES (2, 'Profit Margin', 'Profit margin percentage', 'SELECT ((SUM(revenue) - SUM(cost)) / SUM(revenue) * 100) FROM sales', 'Graph');

INSERT INTO KPIs (kpi_name, id, visualization_type, kpi_description, calculation_query) VALUES ('Website Traffic', 3, 'Dashboard', 'Daily website traffic data', 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM website_traffic');

INSERT INTO KPIs (kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type, id) VALUES ('Customer Satisfaction', 'Customer satisfaction rating', 'SELECT AVG(rating) FROM feedback', 'Summary', 4);
INSERT INTO KPIs (id, kpi_name, kpi_description, calculation_query, visualization_type) VALUES (5, 'Productivity', 'Employee productivity rate', 'SELECT AVG(productivity) FROM employees', 'Meter');
